mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (product_id, user_id, comment) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, user_id, product_id, comment, nickname FROM t_comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
SELECT c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.product_id, c.comment, u.nickname FROM t_comment c JOIN t_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC
